entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Local blowing snow. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
